sentences.sContent: The rough, dimply surfaces of Mentos encourage bubble growth because they efficiently disrupt the polar attractions between water molecules, creating bubble growth sites.
sentences.sContent_eng: The rough, dimply surfaces of Mentos encourage bubble growth because they efficiently disrupt the polar attractions between water molecules, creating bubble growth sites.
sentences.sCn: 粗糙的有纹路的曼妥斯促使泡泡增长，因为他们有效地中断水分子之间的极吸引力，使泡泡数量变多了。

trans.tranCn: 有酒窝的, 有凹处的
